# Winter's Gentle Glow
## Scripture
"For the Lord is good and his love endures forever; his faithfulness continues through all generations." - Psalm 100:5

## Reflection
As we gaze upon the winter sky, we notice the gentle glow of the stars and planets. The soft twinkle of celestial bodies reminds us of God's enduring love and faithfulness. Just as the winter season may seem barren, but secretly holds the promise of new life, our faith journey may have its quiet moments. Yet, in these stillnesses, God is working, nurturing, and preparing us for what's to come. The phases of the moon, from new to full, symbolize the ebbs and flows of our spiritual walk. As we trust in God's sovereignty, we can find peace in the assurance that His love and faithfulness will continue through all generations.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, as we marvel at the gentle glow of the winter sky, remind us of Your enduring love and faithfulness. Help us to trust in Your sovereignty, even in the quiet moments of our faith journey. May we find peace in the assurance that Your love will continue through all generations. As we navigate the ebbs and flows of life, guide us to fix our eyes on Your steadfast heart, and may we reflect Your gentle glow to a world in need of Your love. Amen.
